data.lyric:
[ti:XanaX Damage (Explicit)]
[ar:Future]
[al:SAVE ME (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]XanaX Damage (Explicit) - Future
[00:01.07]Lyrics by：Nayvadius Wilburn/Kyle Nelson/Robert John Richardson/William Eduardo Yanez
[00:02.15]Composed by：Nayvadius Wilburn/Kyle Nelson/Robert John Richardson/William Eduardo Yanez
[00:03.22]La la
[00:06.41]Love seein' these dreams
[00:10.31]Oh
[00:11.20]Over and over
[00:14.22]Baby when the sun is out it's like I'm not myself
[00:17.52]Xanax done damage make it nice so I can handle it
[00:21.07]Baby when the moon is out I finally know myself
[00:24.00]Xanax pills then I feel my body startin' to give up yeah
[00:27.43]I only call you when I'm faded
[00:29.85]Your arms around me come and save me
[00:33.42]I only want you to have my baby
[00:36.81]When I'm drunk and I'm down and depressed
[00:39.43]I just need to confess yeah yeah
[00:44.51]Oh oh-oh
[00:48.70]Baby if I want you then I know there's somethin' wrong
[00:52.10]I don't mean to ruin all the times we had alone
[00:55.46]But I'm not my best with you I'm so depressed with you
[00:59.25]But it's so hard I don't think I can exist without you
[01:04.41]I only call you when I'm faded
[01:07.66]Your arms around me come and save me
[01:11.41]I only want you to have my baby
[01:14.89]When I'm drunk and I'm down and depressed
[01:17.43]I just need to confess yeah yeah
[01:22.54]Oh oh-oh
[01:26.66]Baby when the sun is out it's like I'm not myself
[01:30.06]Xanax done damage make it nice so I can handle it
[01:33.55]Baby when the moon is out I finally know myself
[01:36.45]Xanax pills then I feel my body startin' to give up yeah
data.trans:
[ti:XanaX Damage (Explicit)]
[ar:Future]
[al:SAVE ME (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.07]//
[00:02.14]//
[00:03.22]//
[00:06.41]喜欢回忆那些梦境
[00:10.31]//
[00:11.20]反反复复
[00:14.22]宝贝 太阳出来之后 我就会变成另一副模样
[00:17.52]***确实会损害身体 对我好一点 至少让我能够承受
[00:21.07]宝贝 月亮出来的时候 我终于明白了自己的心
[00:24.00]吃了*** 我感觉我的身体渐渐失去知觉
[00:27.43]我只有不省人事时才会给你打电话
[00:29.85]用你的手臂拥紧我 快来救救我
[00:33.42]我只是想让你给我生个孩子
[00:36.81]在我喝醉时 在我难过时 在我沮丧时
[00:39.43]我只是想要说出心里的话
[00:44.51]//
[00:48.70]宝贝 我明知这样不对 可我还是会想你
[00:52.10]我不想毁了我们曾经的美好时光
[00:55.46]但我们不合适 和你在一起我并不开心
[00:59.25]可又舍不得放手 没有你我要怎么活下去呢
[01:04.41]我只有在不省人事时才会给你打电话
[01:07.66]用你的手臂拥紧我 快来救救我
[01:11.41]我只是想让你给我生个孩子
[01:14.89]在我喝醉时 在我难过时 在我沮丧时
[01:17.43]我只是想要说出心里的话
[01:22.54]//
[01:26.66]宝贝 太阳出来之后 我就会变成另一副模样
[01:30.06]***确实会损害身体 对我好一点 至少让我能够承受
[01:33.55]宝贝 月亮出来的时候 我终于明白了自己的心
[01:36.45]吃了*** 我感觉我的身体渐渐失去知觉
